memberdef.argsstring: (Engine &engine, OverlayType type, SceneSPtr scene, OverlaySPtr parent)
memberdef.name: Overlay

briefdescription.para: adds a child to the overlay

simplesect.para: true if successful, false if not

briefdescription.para: Retrieves the childs count at given level.
Retrieves the absolute overlay position, in pixels.
Retrieves the absolute overlay size, in pixels.

simplesect.para: true if this overlay's or one of its parents' size has changed.
true if this overlay's or one of its parents' position has changed.

briefdescription.para: Retrieves an iterator to the first child.
Retrieves an iterator to the first child.
Retrieves an iterator to after the last child.
Retrieves an iterator to after the last child.
Sets the relative position of the overlay.
Sets the relative size of the overlay.

Sets the relative size of the overlay.
Sets the name of the overlay.
